name: Dino Dashers
description:
Dino Dashers is a frantic coin collecting and friend stomping 4-player Arena couch co-op game where you play as Dinos trying ro collect as many coins while dashing and stomping your friends to prevent them from snagging the precious coins!

The Game was made during a 48-hour game Jam during the 8th of May 2020 to the 10th of may 2020.

The game is planned to expand and get more features in the future.

Known Issues:

-Game may crash upon luancing a second game

-Players can sometiems select the same dino
